textline.text: Harvard College Fellows Program, Department of Sociology
Dissertation: Life Chances: Infant Mortality, Institutions, and Inequality in the United States
Committee: Jason Beckfield (chair), Bruce Western, Christopher Jencks
BA, Sociology and Political Science − Phi Beta Kappa, magna cum laude
